attributes.action: Demand and centrally fund an investigation into the suicides of young people in Bridgend
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: In a little over a year there have been 16 suicides of young people in the Bridgend Area of South Walses.  The Coroner has stated publically that there is no commonality shared by them and the police that they do not appear to be connected.  Pre-conceived case theories play no useful role in the investigation of crime and we petion the PM to demand a rigorous Investigation, centrally funded, in order to resolve this on-going tragedy.

rejection.details: This is a matter for the police.
reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
